headline: As U.S. Drilling Cools, Oilfield Service Firms Chase Middle East Demand
summary: With U.S. activity slowing, major oilfield service firms including SLB, Halliburton, Weatherford, Helmerich & Payne, and Patterson-UTI Energy are pivoting toward the Middle East for growth

raw.headline: As U.S. Drilling Cools, Oilfield Service Firms Chase Middle East Demand
raw.summary: With U.S. activity slowing, major oilfield service firms including SLB, Halliburton, Weatherford, Helmerich & Payne, and Patterson-UTI Energy are pivoting toward the Middle East for growth

headline: SLB, Baker Hughes Are Beating Big Tech By 30% In 2026: Here's Why
summary: Energy's winning streak rolls on as SLB and Baker Hughes surge ~30% YTD while Big Tech stalls — here's what's driving the gap.

raw.headline: SLB, Baker Hughes Are Beating Big Tech By 30% In 2026: Here's Why
raw.summary: Energy's winning streak rolls on as SLB and Baker Hughes surge ~30% YTD while Big Tech stalls — here's what's driving the gap.

headline: TGS announces Engagement Phase 9 in the Gulf of America
summary: OSLO, Norway (10 February 2026) – TGS, a global provider of energy data and intelligence, in strategic collaboration with SLB, today announced the launch of Engagement 9, the latest phase of the companies’ Ocean Bottom Node (OBN) multi-client campaign in the Gulf of America. Commencing earlier this month, Engagement 9 covers 161 OCS blocks in the Walker Ridge protraction area, one of the Gulf of America’s most prolific deepwater provinces. This new dataset is expected to deliver step change impr
